 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁתְּוָן‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==letter== (usually derived from Persian <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> i.e. ***writing***, [[BDB#Hoffm|Hoffm]]<sup>ZA ii (1887), 52</sup> yet compare [[BDB#Mey|Meyer]]<sup>Judenthum 22</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Ezra.4.7|Ezra 4:7]]; [[Ezra.7.11|Ezra 7:11]].
